text: Need Cameron Parker for Kmart campaign. Budget around $4,885, looking for 1 x Twitter post, 2 x Professional headshots, 2 x 60-second YouTube video, 3 x 15-second TikTok, 2 x Pinterest pin. 2 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs December 2025. Usage rights for 12 months. Engagement period: 2 months.
